characters.about: Student studying at Leeds metropolitian university for Law and copyright
Main job involves being a prison guard, but is involved with illegal activity inside and outside of the prison he works at
Part time empolyed to look after physically disabled children at a local hospital, and spends the rest of her time looking after her own kids
Works for a garage popularily known for over the top car modifications, but also spend his spare time going to sports events and drinking
Recently left college and only just starting a work opportunity provided by his grandparents
Dedicated long time worker of a local DIY store, and longest running manager in the companies history
Dedicated as much as her husband to her job, aswell as very versed in agricultar practices such as farming and harvesting
Professional helicopter pilot, and strong passion for travel and vehicles
